Field.DisplayName: Recognition distance [m] - 認識距離[m]
Field.Description: Distance to recognize hostile characters - 敵性キャラクタを認識する距離

Field.DisplayName: Recognition angle X [deg] - 認識角度Ｘ[deg]
Field.Description: X angle for recognizing hostile characters: The current line-of-sight direction is 0 degrees, and the top is +. - 敵性キャラクタを認識するX角度 現在の視線方向を０度として、上が＋。

Field.DisplayName: Recognition angle Y [deg] - 認識角度Y[deg]
Field.Description: Y angle for recognizing hostile characters: The current line-of-sight direction is 0 degrees, and the right is +. - 敵性キャラクタを認識するY角度 現在の視線方向を０度として、右が＋。

Field.DisplayName: Territory distance [m] - 縄張り距離[m]
Field.Description: The distance of your territory. If the recognizing player deviates from this distance, it will return to the initial position. - 自分の縄張りの距離。認識しているプレイヤーがこの距離から外れると初期位置に戻ります。

Field.DisplayName: Intimidation rate before attack [0-100] - 攻撃前威嚇率[0～100]
Field.Description: Probability of threatening before attack - 攻撃前に威嚇する確率

Field.DisplayName: First recognition menacing - 初回認識威嚇
Field.Description: Whether to intimidate when recognizing the first player - 初回プレイヤー認識時に必ず威嚇するかどうか

Field.DisplayName: reserve - 予約
Attack 1 Maai [m] - 攻撃１ 間合い[m]
Field.Description: Time to attack [m] - 攻撃するときの間合い[m]

Field.DisplayName: Attack 1 Maai play [m] - 攻撃１ 間合い遊び[m]
Field.Description: Play between attacks. Do not vibrate near the distance - 攻撃間合いの遊び。間合い距離近辺で、振動しないように

Field.DisplayName: Attack 1 ratio [0-100] - 攻撃１ 割合[0～100]
Field.Description: Frequency of attacks - 攻撃の頻度

Field.DisplayName: Attack 1 type - 攻撃１ 種類
Field.Description: Types of attacks - 攻撃の種類

Field.DisplayName: Attack 1 Minimum delay time [frame] - 攻撃１ 最小遅延時間[frame]
Field.Description: The minimum delay time from the time when an attack becomes possible to the time when an attack is possible. - 攻撃可能になった時点から、攻撃するまでの遅延時間の最小。

Field.DisplayName: Attack 1 Maximum delay time [frame] - 攻撃１ 最長遅延時間[frame]
Field.Description: The longest delay time from the time when an attack becomes possible to the time when an attack is possible. - 攻撃可能になった時点から、攻撃するまでの遅延時間の最長。

Field.DisplayName: Attack 1 Attack permission Conical angle [deg] - 攻撃１ 攻撃許可円錐の角度[deg]
Field.Description: If the angle between the line-of-sight direction and the direction vector to the target is within this angle, the attack is OK. - 視線方向とターゲットへの方向ベクトルのなす角が、この角度以内の場合、攻撃ＯＫ。
